Computers-Tablets.ProductName: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 3 11 Touchscreen 2-in-1 Chromebook - Blue (Intel Celeron N4000/64GB eMMC/4GB RAM/Chrome)
Computers-Tablets.Overview: Access everything you need at your fingertips with the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 3 Chromebook. Powered by the Intel Celeron N4000 processor with 4GB RAM, this 2-in-1 touchscreen laptop delivers great performance for all your computing tasks. The webcam with physical shutter and 10-hour battery life makes this device a trusty companion from day to night.
Computers-Tablets.MoreInformation:
1.1GHz 2-core Intel Celeron N4000 processor and 4GB of LPDDR4 RAM ensure smooth and lag-free performance while you're working on multiple applications simultaneously 
 64 GB eMMC HDD offers faster storing and retrieving speeds for your project files and other media files 
 2-in-1 11.6-inch FHD IPS touchscreen laptop with Intel UHD Graphics 600 graphics card renders bright, clear visuals with lifelike colours in 1336 x 768 native resolution 
  Integrated 802.11ac 2x2 Wi-Fi allows you to access the internet from wireless networks 
 Bluetooth 5.0 technology quickly pairs up with your Bluetooth-enabled devices such as smartphones, tablets, wireless headphones, and more 
 Built-in 3-cell lithium polymer battery gives you a runtime of up to 10 hours when the device is fully charged 
 USB 3.2 port and HDMI 1.4b allows you to connect external storage devices, display units, and other peripherals 
 Built-in webcam with physical shutter offers complete privacy during your video chats 
 Pre-loaded with Chrome OS (bilingual) that integrates with other Android devices

Computers-Tablets.ProductName: ASUS ZenBook 14 Laptop - Pine Grey (AMD Ryzen 5 5500U/512GB SSD/8GB RAM/Windows 11)
Computers-Tablets.Overview: Improve your productivity with the ASUS 14-inch ZenBook. This lightweight laptop is equipped with a hexa-core AMD Ryzen 5 processor, 8GB of RAM, and a bright, clear display to facilitate work tasks and entertainment use. The backlit keyboard offers a separate number pad and an ErgoLift hinge that makes long typing sessions more comfortable..
Computers-Tablets.MoreInformation:
2.1GHz hexa-core AMD Ryzen 5 5500U processor and 8GB LPDDR4X RAM enable excellent performance for all kinds of computer tasks 
 512GB PCIe solid-state drive (SSD) allows for quick data transfer and plenty of storage for your files 
 14-inch anti-glare Full HD 4-way NanoEdge bezel display with 1920 x 1080 resolution ensures text is crisp and easy to read and colours are vivid 
  Integrated Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) and dual-band Bluetooth 5.0 enable you to go wireless when connecting to networks and compatible devices 
 4S1P, 4-Cell Lithium-Ion battery powers your device for many hours of use 
 Sleek, lightweight laptop is easy to transport at only 2.7lbs (1.22kg) 
 One USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, two USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C ports, and one HDMI 2.1 port are available to support secondary devices, like monitors and printers 
 Built tough to MIL-STD 810G military standards for exceptional reliability and durability 
 Backlit bilingual keyboard with number pad enables low-light use, and ErgoLift hinge allows for comfortable typing 
 Pre-loaded with the bilingual Windows 10 Home operating system so you can start using your laptop right away

Computers-Tablets.ProductName: Acer Aspire 3 15.6 Laptop - Silver (AMD Ryzen R3-3250U/512GB/8GB RAM/Windows 11)
Computers-Tablets.Overview: Complete your everyday to-do list seamlessly with the Acer Aspire 3 15.6 laptop. Equipped with an AMD Ryzen R3-3250U processor and 8GB DDR4 RAM, this laptop makes your everyday computing easy and smooth. With 512GB SSD, you don't need to worry about the storage for your documents while the 36Wh lithium-ion battery keeps the device running for hours.
Computers-Tablets.MoreInformation:
AMD Ryzen R3-3250U processor and 8GB DDR4 RAM make this device powerful enough to smoothly handle your everyday computing tasks 
 512GB solid state drive offers ample space for all your documents, media, software and more 
 15.6-inch FHD screen with 1920 x 1080 resolution gives you a superior viewing experience 
  Ethernet 10/100/1000 port, 802.11ac Wi-Fi (dual-band 2.4GHz and 5GHz), and Bluetooth 4.2 offer provision for reliable wireless connectivity 
 36Wh 2-cell lithium-ion battery with up to 8 hours lifetime makes you worry less about charging 
 Two USB 3.2 Gen 1, 1 USB 2.0, a HDMI port with HDCP support, a 3.5 mm headphone/speaker jack, and an optical digital audio output let you connect various peripheral devices 
 Webcam lets you to stay connected with your friends and family over video chats 
 HDCP compliant design allows you to stream high-definition content from authorized sources 
 Preinstalled with Windows 11 operating system that features advanced features and apps for improved security and performance
